# AI Changelog Generator

Generate CHANGELOG.md from git commit history.

## Usage
```bash
praison run ai-changelog-generator ./my-repo
praison run ai-changelog-generator ./my-repo --since v1.0.0
```

## Output
- `CHANGELOG.md` - Formatted changelog
- `release-notes.md` - Human-readable summary
- `commits.json` - Structured commit data
